This naming choice connects family heritage with scientific achievement. It highlights Musk's admiration for thinkers who advance our understanding of the universe.

He also criticised captain Ben Stokes's 'has-beens' comment, highlighting the lack of Ashes success for the current squad in Australia.

description: Senator Cory Booker's recent marriage to Alexis Lewis has reignited long-standing, baseless rumors about his sexuality. These whispers, circulating for over two decades, stemmed from his articulate nature and initial privacy regarding his orientation. Despite his marriage, the internet's tendency to cling to speculation highlights societal discomfort with complexity and stereotypes surrounding masculinity and public figures.

It highlighted the need to understand why clear skies were visible years ago but not now.

description: A first-year B Tech Computer Science student from Chhattisgarh, Rahul Yadav, was found hanging in his hostel room at KIIT. Spying for Pak: BrahMos scientist gets clean chit; was accused of passing sensitive info
description: Nishant Agarwal, a scientist at BrahMos Aerospace Limited, has been cleared of major charges related to passing defense secrets. He was arrested in 2018. The higher judiciary has now absolved him of charges under the Information Technology Act and Official Secrets Act. Agarwal will be released soon, having served his sentence for possessing official documents on his personal device.

title: 120/80 isn’t just a reading: What your blood pressure gap says about heart health
description: Understanding your blood pressure's two numbers, systolic and diastolic, is crucial for assessing heart and blood vessel health. Systolic measures the heart's pumping effort, while diastolic reflects pressure during relaxation, vital for heart muscle oxygenation. Age influences their significance, with diastolic being more predictive under 50 and systolic after 50 due to arterial stiffening.

description: Gaurav Gogoi accused Prime Minister Modi of "hijacking Parliament" during the Winter Session, alleging the government refuses to discuss the Indian election system. Gogoi stated that while the opposition is willing to cooperate on government bills, the BJP is not accommodating opposition issues in the parliamentary agenda, undermining democratic functioning.

Samantha shared wedding photos on Instagram, showcasing her red bridal saree and the joyous occasion. The wedding took place at the Ling Bhairavi Temple within the Isha Yoga Centre.

S-400s, oil & RuPay-Mir: Modi–Putin summit tests India's tightrope between Russia, the West
description: As Russian President Vladimir Putin visits New Delhi, it will be his first visit to India since the Ukraine war began. As the two old partners Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Putin meet again, the news will be about missiles and credit cards, fighter jets, and oil flows. But the real story behind may be far more complicated.

title: Murder selfie: How wife's intimate photo sent by lover enraged man; accused found sitting near body
description: A man murdered his estranged wife in a women's hostel after receiving an intimate photo of her with her lover. He then took a selfie with her body and posted it as his WhatsApp status. The accused was arrested at the scene and remanded to judicial custody.

title: 'Leave country now': Trump's blunt ultimatum to Maduro; US-Venezuela tensions flare
description: President Trump issued an ultimatum to Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro, offering safe passage in exchange for immediate departure. Maduro reportedly refused, demanding global amnesty and control of the armed forces, leading to collapsed talks. Trump acknowledged speaking with Maduro but offered no details, later warning of Venezuelan airspace closure amid escalating US military presence and accusations of fueling a drug crisis.

title: Shedeur Sanders’ mom stuns in proud mama style with glam game-day look
description: Shedeur Sanders made his professional home debut for the Cleveland Browns, showcasing his potential despite a loss to the 49ers. Supported by his stylish mother, Pilar, who also garnered attention, Shedeur aims to solidify his starting quarterback role. Coach Stefanski praised his commitment, highlighting his growth after his first start.

title: Anthony Davis’ heartfelt 3-word message to JJ Redick after emotional Lakers clash
description: Anthony Davis expressed strong admiration for his former coach, JJ Redick, after facing him for the first time post-trade.  Despite the Lakers' loss to the Mavericks, Davis highlighted their enduring bond, recalling Redick's debut season as a learning experience for both.  This encounter underscored the mutual respect between the two as their NBA careers progress.

title: Govt to back air passengers in SC against Delhi, Mumbai airport operators in Rs 50,000 crore suit
description: The Indian government will back the Airports Economic Regulatory Authority of India (AERA) in a Supreme Court battle against Delhi and Mumbai airport operators. The case concerns a Rs 50,000-crore claim for hypothetical regulatory asset base, which could lead to significant hikes in passenger charges if awarded to the operators.

title: Cardi B and Stefon Diggs look in love while celebrating his birthday on Instagram
description: Cardi B delighted fans by sharing glimpses of Stefon Diggs' birthday. A custom Snoopy football cake, celebrating his jersey number, stole the show. Later, a video captured the couple joyfully rapping and dancing in a car, radiating pure, unadulterated fun. This intimate peek into their celebration resonated deeply, earning them 'relationship goals' praise.

title: Leon Draisaitl’s sharp message puts fresh spotlight on Connor McDavid’s leadership
description: Leon Draisaitl responded with 'Lol' to criticism about Edmonton Oilers' leadership.  The podcast suggested top players like Draisaitl and Connor McDavid should provide more direction.  Despite past Stanley Cup Final appearances, the Oilers face defensive struggles this season.  Their offense remains strong with McDavid and Draisaitl.  Fans are divided on the criticism.  The team's on-ice performance will ultimately show leadership.

title: From Apple to Microsoft: Bill Gates billion-dollar bet; How Gates bought Halo game maker
description: Microsoft's 2000 acquisition of Bungie Studios, spurred by a 1999 Macworld demo of Halo with Steve Jobs, secured a flagship franchise for the then-upcoming Xbox.  Initially a Mac-exclusive concept, Microsoft's timely offer rescued a struggling Bungie and transformed Halo into a system-defining, billion-dollar success that reshaped console gaming.

title: Anamaria Goltes: All you need to know about Lakers star Luka Doncic’s fiancée
description: Luka Doncic's childhood sweetheart, Anamaria Goltes, a Slovenian model and entrepreneur, has been his unwavering support. The couple, who met as children, are building a life in Los Angeles with their daughter. Goltes skillfully balances her modeling career, influencer status, and life as a partner to a basketball superstar, adapting to his moves and embracing the spotlight.

title: Thousands of Amazon employees send open letter to CEO; question layoffs
description: Over a thousand Amazon employees have penned an open letter, warning that the company's rapid AI development is jeopardizing its climate commitments and human workforce.  They argue the pursuit of AI dominance is leading to increased emissions, water scarcity, and job displacement, urging leadership to prioritize ethical AI and environmental responsibility.
